name: Color Lines - Lines 98 Deluxe
description:
Color Lines is color game inspired by Lines 98 and four in a line. It’s easy to grasp and very addictive.

Are you a block puzzle master? Blendoku lovers? If so you'll love this Color lines Game!
The goal is simple: Keep screen clean by arranging four or more blocks of the same color into one line.
The line can be horizontal, vertical or diagonal. Move the block by touching it and target position.

Have fun with this Best Color Strategy Game!
